divs: Sighting Detailsit was early fall of 97. Me an my wife an our daughter were leaving family home. Lookout Valley GA.heding home to ringold GA. When i got hwy196 red light I saw bright light above the ridge.I told my wife to look .Her aplie was o thats lights from ball feild .Was agood answer but the lights were the wrong side.As i crossed hwy began to tell her to shut up.As we drove uo the ridge i began turn off everthing.I pulled over in the middle of hwy.I was in shock at size of it,i had my head out the window looking up.No sound was made.Ithad a beam of light coming from the bottom that lightup 3 or 4 tree tops.Nothing moved not a sound was made.This was a mind blowing moment of my life,My life has changed forever.Did not say anything to anyone for a week.I expected to see something on the News for this is a small towne.Nothing was mentioned about this at all.The follwing weekend i was at family's home when i could not hold it in no longer.I began to tell my brothering law what i had seen the weekend before.Before i could finish he explained everthing i was going to tell him he had saw 3 nights later over same ridge.That blowed my mind that he saw the same thing.The only way i can explain what i saw just unbelevable.Something out of starwars.
Summary: as large as a football feild hovering over a ridge 150 yards above my car
trends: There has been one other sighting in Rossville
There were no other sightings in Rossville on or around September 20th 1997
